articles.author: SCOTT SONNER
articles.title: Nevada lithium mine will crush rare plant habitat US said is critical to its survival, lawsuit says - The Associated Press
articles.description: Conservationists and a Native American tribe are suing to block a Nevada lithium mine they say will drive an endangered wildflower to extinction, disrupt groundwater flows and threaten cultural resources. The Center for Biological Diversity promised the court…
articles.content: RENO, Nev. (AP) Conservationists and a Native American tribe are suing the U.S. to try to block a Nevada lithium mine they say will drive an endangered desert wildflower to extinction, disrupt ground… [+4118 chars]
